definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mainly dealing with camellia oil, tea drinks and tea powder and so on.
sentences.chinese: 主要生產山茶油，茶飲料和茶粉等產品。

sentences.english: Rich in organic matter, for the Camellia provides a good growing conditions.
sentences.chinese: 豐富的有機質，爲山茶提供了良好的生長條件。

sentences.english: Determination of chemical composition of utility parts of anti-osteoporosis in the seeds of Camellia japonica L.
sentences.chinese: 山茶種子抗骨質疏鬆有效部位羣化學成分的含量測定。

sentences.english: The floral development of E. excelsum is distinctly different from plants in Theoideae .
sentences.chinese: 豬血木與山茶亞科的花器官發生明顯不同。

sentences.english: Tap water around here is very hard and camellias don't like it.
sentences.chinese: 這周邊的自來水很硬，山茶花並不喜歡。

sentences.english: He likes to smoke the cigarette of the camellia brand.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡吸山茶花牌香菸。

sentences.english: Camellia japonica as the floral emblem of Qingdao, In recent years, concerned.
sentences.chinese: 耐冬山茶作爲青島市的市花，近年來備受關注。

sentences.english: Camellia japonica through radiation treatment strengthencold- resistance.
sentences.chinese: 輻射處理的山茶花抗寒性增強。

sentences.english: In addition, the camellia oil there is a certain catharsis.
sentences.chinese: 此外，山茶油還有一定的通便作用。

sentences.english: It is refined from camellia tree seeds.
sentences.chinese: 這是成品，從山茶花樹的種子。

sentences.english: She was at the table by the window, examining the camellia.
sentences.chinese: 她在窗前的桌子旁審視着山茶花。

sentences.english: Black and green tea comes from the same plant, Camellia sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶和綠茶都來自於一種稱之爲山茶的植物。

sentences.english: That's when the azaleas and camellias bloom.
sentences.chinese: 那是杜鵑花和山茶花開放的時候。

sentences.english: There are at least 29 species and 3 variants of genus Camellia in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 四川省山茶屬植物目前至少有29種3變種。

sentences.english: Camellia oil can promote bone growth, promote the generation of mining agents and calcium absorption.
sentences.chinese: 山茶油能促進骨骼生長，促進礦劑的生成和鈣的吸收。

sentences.english: It can also affect garden shrubs, such as rhododendron and camellia.
sentences.chinese: 它也影響公園內的灌木，如杜鵑和山茶花。

definition: narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]
